marklogic.body: annie knows! every 10 years or so america needs a soulful diva who can sing her ass Off. the last one was beyonce. now she's 30 and has had a great 14 year run as a powerhouse talent. before her it was mariah. now she's pushing 40. it's time for a new girl to fill that Spot. rhianna has too weak of a voice and jennifer, as wonderful as she is, is beyonce's age. who better than exotic and immensely talented 16 year old jessica should a major record company take a chance on? with the right song and producer she has the potential to go all the way to the top of the charts.
